original_text: Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies: for false witnesses are risen up against me, and such as breathe out cruelty.
korean_text: 내 생명을 내 대적에게 맡기지 마소서 위증자와 악을 토하는 자가 일어나 나를 치려 함이니이다

sentences.original_text: unto the will of mine enemies
for false witnesses are risen up against me
and such as breathe out cruelty
